summary: Doubles the price of training at all tiers
descriptionHtml:
Expensive Training
-----------------------

A mod for those who have a lot of gold but want more to spend it on, here is a mod that will basically double the training cost at all levels.   If you find making gold hard in Skyrim, this mod probably isn\'t for you.

========================

Playing regular Vanilla Skyrim, here are three skill example prices of how much you now pay:

Training Destruction from 33 to 34 costs 380 Gold Septims
Training Enchanting from 68 to 69 costs 2090 Gold Septims
Training Lockpicking from 79 to 80 costs 4000 Gold Septims

Playing Skyrim AFTER installing this mod, it will now cost you:

Training Destruction from 33 to 34 costs 710 Gold Septims
Training Enchanting from 68 to 69 costs 4130 Gold Septims
Training Lockpicking from 79 to 80 costs 7950 Gold Septims

Enjoy!

Installation
==========

1) Extract the .rar file
2) Copy the expensivetraining.esp file
3) Paste it into your /skyrim/data/ folder
4) Activate in Data Files / Wrye Bash /  Etc

=======================================================

Other recomended Gold Sinks and Economy Difficulty Increasers

Cutthroat Merchants - Get less from selling, pay more when buying
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2762

More Expensive Cart Travel and Inn Rooms:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4290

No Gold on Draugr\'s or in their Urns
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9368
author: Oomo
